security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing optimization guidance for Next.js 15. It provides instructional content and does not include any executable code, scripts, network operations, or file system modifications beyond user-initiated code edits. The skill aligns with its stated purpose of performance optimization.

content.value_statement: Slow Next.js applications hurt user experience and SEO rankings. This skill analyzes your app and provides specific optimizations for Core Web Vitals, bundle size, and rendering strategies to achieve blazing-fast load times.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes Next.js project structure and version compatibility
Identifies performance issues like unoptimized images and large bundles
Optimizes rendering strategies (Server Components, Client Components, ISR, SSG)
Configures Next.js image and font optimization
Implements data fetching patterns to prevent waterfalls
limitations: Cannot execute builds or run Lighthouse directly (user must run commands)
Does not modify third-party dependencies or external API behavior
Requires user approval before applying code changes
Does not provide server infrastructure optimization advice

best_practices: Use Server Components by default and only add 'use client' for interactive leaf components
Preload above-the-fold images with the priority prop to hit LCP targets under 2.5s
Wrap slow components in Suspense boundaries to enable streaming and improve perceived performance
anti_patterns: Using 'use client' at the top level of pages instead of leaf components
Not specifying width and height on images causing cumulative layout shifts
Fetching data sequentially instead of using Promise.all for parallel requests

faq.question: Which Next.js versions are supported?
faq.answer: This skill is designed for Next.js 15 and works with App Router. It can provide basic guidance for Next.js 13-14.

faq.question: What are the target Core Web Vitals scores?
faq.answer: LCP under 2.5s, FID under 100ms, and CLS under 0.1. The skill helps you achieve and maintain these targets.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my code automatically?
faq.answer: No. The skill suggests optimizations and you must approve each change before it is applied to your codebase.

faq.question: Is my code and data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads your files to analyze them and suggests optimizations. No data is sent anywhere.

faq.question: Why are my pages still slow after optimization?
faq.answer: Check server response times, database queries, and third-party scripts. This skill optimizes client-side performance.

faq.question: How does this compare to other Next.js tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered guidance tailored to your codebase. Use it alongside @next/bundle-analyzer and Lighthouse.
